content:
Yes, Sony BMG has been involved in producing the soundtracks for many popular television series. Some other notable examples include:

1. Better Call Saul: This television series is a spinoff of Breaking Bad and is produced by Sony Pictures Television. Sony BMG releases the show's soundtrack albums.

2. Stranger Things: This popular Netflix series is produced by 21 Laps Entertainment and Monkey Massacre Productions and distributed by Netflix. The show's soundtrack is released by Sony BMG.

3. The Boys: This superhero TV series, produced by Amazon Studios, is based on the comic book series of the same name by Garth Ennis and Darick Robertson. Sony BMG releases the soundtrack for the show.

4. Fargo: This dark comedy-crime anthology series created by Noah Hawley is produced by MGM Television and FX Productions. The soundtrack for the show is released by Sony BMG.

5. The Handmaid's Tale: This dystopian drama series based on the novel by Margaret Atwood is produced by MGM Television and Hulu. Sony BMG releases the show's soundtrack albums.

These are just a few examples of the many popular TV series that Sony BMG has been involved in producing soundtracks for.
